text: (Lo! (on that day) those who disbelieve) in Allah, the Scriptures and messengers, each one will say to himself: I abhor you, O my self! (are informed by proclamation) and the angels will call to them: (Verily Allah's abhorrence) in the life of this world (is more terrible than your abhorrence one of another) today in the Fire, (when ye were called unto the faith but did refuse) but denied.
